page.title: 13Shopping
page.content: There is {one shop}in Peak Forest it is a well stocked general shop and also a post office.Most people buy some items there but families with cars often do the majority of their grocery shopping in near by towns,especially Buxton,where supermarkets have a wider range of goods.Milk is regulary delivered to each house and the{milkman}carries other dairy products as well as soft drinks, eggs and potatoes. A{butcher}delivers on a weekly basis and a{mobile greengrocers' van}calls on Wednesdays.Other travelling salesmen call with cleaning materials etc.and farms can purchase tools and equipment from such people.
